backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor for the Game Vault backend, defining types and state for products, categories, orders, user profiles, store settings, and subscription tiers, with admin-gated CRUD operations and access control via mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report JSON file with no features listed.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document containing one-to-two sentence summaries of each frontend source file, serving as a reference for the project's frontend components and pages.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS entry point defining OKLCH-based design tokens for light and dark themes, including colors for backgrounds, borders, charts, and sidebar elements.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the Game Vault app with dark mode class, inline critical CSS to prevent white flash, and a script tag loading the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component implementing hash-based client-side routing, cart state management, authentication checks, profile setup modal, and rendering of all pages including storefront, checkout, admin, and subscriptions.
frontend/src/components/AccessDeniedScre: Displays a styled access denied message with a shield icon and a back-to-store link for users lacking admin privileges.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminWhite: React component for managing an admin username whitelist, allowing admins to add or remove usernames with confirmation dialogs and toast notifications, backed by React Query cache.
frontend/src/components/admin/OrderManag: Admin component that fetches and displays all orders in a table, showing buyer info, product name, payment method badge, and order status for each order.
frontend/src/components/admin/PaymentsMa: Admin component for reviewing and acting on orders, displaying payment method and approval status badges with approve/decline action buttons that call backend mutations.
frontend/src/components/admin/ProductFor: Form component for creating or editing a product, with fields for game name, title, description, account details, price, and availability, supporting both add and update mutations.
frontend/src/components/admin/ProductMan: Admin component that lists all products in a table with options to add, edit, or delete each product using dialogs and alert dialogs, integrating category name lookup.
frontend/src/components/admin/StoreSetti: Admin settings panel for managing PayPal, Bitcoin, and Ethereum wallet addresses, pre-populating fields from fetched store settings and saving each independently with toast feedback.
frontend/src/components/admin/Subscripti: Admin UI component for managing subscription tiers, allowing editing of monthly/yearly prices and toggling free trial availability per tier.
frontend/src/components/AdminAccessContr: Wrapper component that gates admin panel access by fetching the caller's username via principal lookup and verifying admin status, showing login prompts or loading states as needed.
frontend/src/components/CartDrawer.tsx: A slide-in cart drawer component that displays cart items with remove functionality, calculates the total price, and provides a checkout button.
frontend/src/components/CategoryCard.tsx: A button component that renders a selectable product category pill with active/inactive styling.
frontend/src/components/checkout/CryptoP: Checkout component for cryptocurrency payments (BTC/ETH) that displays wallet addresses with a generated SVG QR code and copy functionality.
frontend/src/components/checkout/GiftCar: Checkout component for UK gift card payments that validates a gift card code and collects card number and balance before confirming the order.
frontend/src/components/checkout/PayIn3P: Checkout component that splits a payment into 3 monthly installments, showing a schedule of due dates and requiring user agreement before confirming.
frontend/src/components/checkout/Payment: UI component that renders a grid of selectable payment method options (PayPal, Crypto, Gift Card, Pay in 3) and highlights the currently selected one.
frontend/src/components/checkout/PayPalP: Checkout component simulating a PayPal redirect flow, showing a two-step UI where the user first 'redirects' to PayPal then confirms the order.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: A site footer displaying the Game Vault brand, store navigation links, accepted payment methods, and a caffeine.ai attribution.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: A stub/no-op layout component kept for compatibility; actual layout is handled in App.tsx.
A full-screen loading screen with a 40-second video background and a clip-path progress reveal animation on the 'GAME VAULT' title, fading out when complete.
frontend/src/components/Navigation.tsx: A sticky top navigation bar with links to Store, Subscriptions, and Admin pages, a cart icon with item count badge, and Internet Identity login/logout support.
frontend/src/components/ProductCard.tsx: A card component displaying a product's game name, title, description, price, and category badge, with add-to-cart and view-details actions.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: A modal that prompts newly authenticated users to choose a unique username, with debounced availability checking and validation before submission.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor using React Query, invalidating dependent queries whenever the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCart.ts: Defines a React context and provider for shopping cart state, exposing add, remove, and clear item operations along with computed total items and total price.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an Internet Identity authentication context and provider using DFINITY's AuthClient, exposing login/clear functions and status flags for managing user identity lifecycle.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Centralizes all React Query hooks for backend interactions, covering user profiles, usernames, categories, products, orders, and other canister queries and mutations.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet importing Orbitron/Rajdhani fonts and defining Tailwind CSS layers with a dark sunset-themed design system including CSS custom properties, glow utilities, and brand gradients.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider wrapping the root App component.
frontend/src/models/Vehicle.tsx: Defines Three.js 3D vehicle models (sports car, motorcycle, realistic car) as React components using react-three/fiber, with geometry, materials, and animated movement via useFrame.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPanelPage.tsx: Admin panel page with tabbed navigation (products, orders, payments, admins, subscriptions, settings) that renders the corresponding manager component, wrapped in AdminAccessControl for authorization.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: Multi-step checkout page (review, contact, payment method, payment details) that collects user info and places an order using the usePlaceOrder hook, supporting PayPal, crypto, gift card, and Pay-in-3 payment methods.
frontend/src/pages/OrderConfirmationPage: Displays order confirmation details after purchase, polling every 30 seconds for live approval status updates and showing approved/declined/pending badges alongside product and payment info.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetailPage.tsx: Shows a detailed view of a single product including description, pricing, availability, and an add-to-cart button, with a back navigation to the storefront.
frontend/src/pages/StorefrontPage.tsx: Main storefront page that fetches and displays available products with a search bar and category mapping, handling loading, error, and empty states.
frontend/src/pages/SubscriptionCheckoutP: Multi-step subscription checkout page supporting PayPal and cryptocurrency payment methods, displaying tier details, billing cycle, free trial info, and crypto wallet addresses for payment.
frontend/src/pages/SubscriptionsPage.tsx: React page displaying four subscription tiers (Starter, Basic, Premium, Pro) with monthly/yearly billing toggle, tier cards showing prices and perks, and a subscribe button that triggers a callback with the selected tier and billing info.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility module providing functions to extract URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routing, persist them in sessionStorage, and clean sensitive params from the URL bar without page reload.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the default theme with a sunset color palette (gold, orange, pink, purple, dusk tones), custom fonts (Orbitron, Rajdhani), neon/sunset box shadows, and animations like pulse-glow, float, and shimmer.
project_state.json: Project state snapshot (version 43) describing Game Vault, a gaming accounts e-commerce store on ICP with Internet Identity auth, sunset UI theme, subscription tiers, admin panel, and known issues around admin access and category creation.
